title: SIT Teaching and Learning Academy | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA) promotes effective teaching and enables meaningful student learning at the Singapore University of Technology.

text_lines: SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA) develops the pedagogical framework and scholastic environment at SIT to enrich student engagement and learning.
We are enabling impactful teaching and building a community of engaged learners at SIT.
SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA) develops the pedagogical framework and scholastic environment at SIT to enrich student engagement and learning. We achieve this through these main functions.
We partner academic staff to design positive applied learning experiences, and leverage technologies to enhance teaching.
We drive competency-based education (CBE) which is a unique approach to education that focuses on developing and assessing specific competencies or skills.

We collaborate with academic staff to design, produce and integrate digital learning resources into their courses with the aim of enhancing the quality and accessibility of online education in support of learners’ needs and goals.
We use scientific methods to explore learning processes and interactions that improve the educational outcomes of applied learning.
We work with SIT educators to harness suitable innovative EdTech that support and enhance applied learning at SIT.

At SIT, curriculum design is guided by outcome-based and backward-design approaches. Gain a deeper understanding of SIT’s process before using our curated list of resources to develop your module profile.
Thinking of developing your own teaching and learning resources? Discover some tools and technologies you can use from our list of recommended software, equipment and facilities.
Have an innovative teaching and learning methodology or tool that you would like to try out? Apply for Applied Learning and Innovation Grant (ALIGN) to test and research new approaches.
STLA has developed a variety of resources, including online courses and a unique gamified micro-learning platform, to ensure SIT freshmen enjoy a more seamless transition to university education.
STLA staff are well-versed in SIT’s teaching pedagogy. We can help you implement exciting teaching methods and technologies.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.
article_texts:
SIT Teaching and Learning Academy
SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA) develops the pedagogical framework and scholastic environment at SIT to enrich student engagement and learning.
We are enabling impactful teaching and building a community of engaged learners at SIT.
Our Expertise
SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA) develops the pedagogical framework and scholastic environment at SIT to enrich student engagement and learning. We achieve this through these main functions.
Learning Design
We partner academic staff to design positive applied learning experiences, and leverage technologies to enhance teaching.
LEARN MORE
Competency-based Education Hub
We drive competency-based education (CBE) which is a unique approach to education that focuses on developing and assessing specific competencies or skills.
LEARN MORE
Digital Learning Experience
We collaborate with academic staff to design, produce and integrate digital learning resources into their courses with the aim of enhancing the quality and accessibility of online education in support of learners’ needs and goals.
LEARN MORE
Educational Research
We use scientific methods to explore learning processes and interactions that improve the educational outcomes of applied learning.
LEARN MORE
Educational Technology
We work with SIT educators to harness suitable innovative EdTech that support and enhance applied learning at SIT.
LEARN MORE
Faculty Resources
Designing Your Curriculum
At SIT, curriculum design is guided by outcome-based and backward-design approaches. Gain a deeper understanding of SIT’s process before using our curated list of resources to develop your module profile.
LEARN MORE
EdTech Tools & Resources
Thinking of developing your own teaching and learning resources? Discover some tools and technologies you can use from our list of recommended software, equipment and facilities.
VIEW OUR LIST
ALIGN Fund Application
Have an innovative teaching and learning methodology or tool that you would like to try out? Apply for Applied Learning and Innovation Grant (ALIGN) to test and research new approaches.
LEARN MORE
Student Resources
STLA has developed a variety of resources, including online courses and a unique gamified micro-learning platform, to ensure SIT freshmen enjoy a more seamless transition to university education.
Learn More
Connect With Our People
STLA staff are well-versed in SIT’s teaching pedagogy. We can help you implement exciting teaching methods and technologies.
TALK TO US
